str2: A primary particle; but, and, etc.

parse: Verb - Present Imperative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: To ask, request, petition, demand. Of uncertain derivation; to ask.
In, on, among. A primary preposition denoting position, and instrumentality, i.e. A relation of rest; 'in, ' at, on, by, etc.
Faith, belief, trust, confidence; fidelity, faithfulness.

parse: Verb - Present Participle Middle - Nominative Masculine Singular
str2: From dia and krino; to separate thoroughly, i.e. to withdraw from, or oppose; figuratively, to discriminate, or hesitate.
For. A primary particle; properly, assigning a reason.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.

parse: Verb - Present Participle Middle - Nominative Masculine Singular
str2: From dia and krino; to separate thoroughly, i.e. to withdraw from, or oppose; figuratively, to discriminate, or hesitate.

parse: Verb - Perfect Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: To be like, resemble. Apparently a primary verb; to resemble.
Rough water, a wave, billow, surge. From kluzo; a surge of the sea.
Probably prolonged from hals; the sea.

parse: Verb - Present Participle Middle or Passive - Dative Masculine Singular
str2: To be blown with the wind (referring to the gentler motions of the air). From anemos; to toss with the wind.

parse: Verb - Present Participle Middle or Passive - Dative Masculine Singular
str2: To toss to and fro, fan, blow. From a derivative of rhipto; to breeze up, i.e. to agitate.
